meanings.definition: A card game similar to bridge.
meanings.sent1: During the family gathering, we played a fun game of tarabish.
meanings.sent2: Let's invite our friends over to play tarabish this weekend.
meanings.sent3: Grandpa always wins at tarabish, he must have a lucky charm.
meanings.sent4: The competitive spirit in the room was palpable as they played tarabish.
meanings.sent5: The sound of shuffling cards filled the air as they prepared to play tarabish.

meanings.definition: To play the card game tarabish.
meanings.sent1: We often tarabish on Friday nights for some friendly competition.
meanings.sent2: She taught me how to tarabish, and now I can't stop playing.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally tarabished with my little cousin, and he beat me!
meanings.sent4: His strategy was so good, it felt like he could tarabish his way out of any situation.
meanings.sent5: The group gathered around the table, eager to tarabish into the night.
